name: Unreal Engine5 FPS Game
description:
Basic movement FPS prototype made in a month, not planning to do much more with this unless people like it.

Requires: 

- Steam. Make sure the app is open and you are logged in when launching the game. Your online status to friends doesn't matter (e.g. Online, Invisible, Away).

*Warning* This is using an Early Access build of Unreal Engine 5, The onlinesubsystem is pretty broken right now so online matchmaking might not work... for now.

 Features:

Online FFA matches via P2P 

ODM Grapples (press Q and E to left and right respectively)

Wallrunning 

Sliding (Shift while moving)

Lumen Lighting (Defaulted off, Change in Video Settings)

 Guns:

AK-47:   (Press 1 to use)

Peacekeeper: Sniper, not a shotgun (Press 2 to use) 

Sawed-Off: This is the shotgun (Press 3 to use)
